title: Kremlin: Trump sent Putin Covid tests while President
content: Former US President Trump secretly sent Covid-19 testing devices to Russian President Putin during the pandemic, while devices were scarce. The Kremlin confirmed the shipment but denied phone conversations post-Trump presidency. This revelation has sparked criticism from US VP Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden, who accuse Trump of compromising national security by being too close to dictators.
summary: Former US President Trump secretly sent Covid-19 testing devices to Russian President Putin during the pandemic, while devices were scarce. The Kremlin confirmed the shipment but denied phone conversations post-Trump presidency. This revelation has sparked criticism from US VP Kamala Harris and President Joe Biden, who accuse Trump of compromising national security by being too close to dictators.

title: What are 'Ghost guns' which US Supreme Court seeks to regulate?
content: The US Supreme Court demonstrated strong support for federal regulation of ghost guns, endorsing measures to curb untraceable firearm kits. Five justices backed the Biden administration’s regulation mandating serial numbers and background checks. The rule aims to address increasing ghost gun-related violence, with over 70,700 instances reported by the ATF between 2016 and 2022.
summary: The US Supreme Court demonstrated strong support for federal regulation of ghost guns, endorsing measures to curb untraceable firearm kits. Five justices backed the Biden administration’s regulation mandating serial numbers and background checks. The rule aims to address increasing ghost gun-related violence, with over 70,700 instances reported by the ATF between 2016 and 2022.

title: 'It starts with W, ends with an F': What was Kamala's mind during debate with Trump?
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris, in a media blitz, appeared on 'The Late Show with Stephen Colbert.' During the interview, she humorously recalled a debate moment with Trump. This media push, including outlets like CBS's 60 Minutes and podcasts, comes just weeks before the election where she faces former President Donald Trump.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris, in a media blitz, appeared on 'The Late Show with Stephen Colbert.' During the interview, she humorously recalled a debate moment with Trump. This media push, including outlets like CBS's 60 Minutes and podcasts, comes just weeks before the election where she faces former President Donald Trump.

title: What Meghan Markle's former pal says on her charity gala appearance
content: British socialite Lizzie Cundy accuses Meghan Markle of attending the LA Children's Hospital Gala for attention rather than genuine support. Meghan's appearance, including her red dress and soft waves, drew mixed reactions, with Cundy highlighting Meghan's disconnect with the LA community. Lizzie Cundy, 56, who also attended the event last Saturday, stated that Meghan's sole purpose for showing up was "for the photographs."
summary: British socialite Lizzie Cundy accuses Meghan Markle of attending the LA Children's Hospital Gala for attention rather than genuine support. Meghan's appearance, including her red dress and soft waves, drew mixed reactions, with Cundy highlighting Meghan's disconnect with the LA community. Lizzie Cundy, 56, who also attended the event last Saturday, stated that Meghan's sole purpose for showing up was "for the photographs."

title: 4 Mexico mayors seek protection after another was brutally beheaded
content: Four mayors in Mexico requested federal protection after the decapitation of Mayor Alejandro Arcos in Guerrero, less than a week after he took office. Officials have linked high violence levels in Guerrero and Guanajuato to organized crime. Arcos called for increased security but did not make an official request. Investigations are ongoing.
summary: Four mayors in Mexico requested federal protection after the decapitation of Mayor Alejandro Arcos in Guerrero, less than a week after he took office. Officials have linked high violence levels in Guerrero and Guanajuato to organized crime. Arcos called for increased security but did not make an official request. Investigations are ongoing.

title: Watch: Vice President Kamala Harris cracks open a beer during 'Late Show' on campaign trail
content: Vice President Harris, appearing on The Late Show, tackled key issues such as the Gaza conflict and Trump’s pandemic response, while balancing relatability by sharing a beer with Colbert. Harris' media presence emphasises her proactive stance ahead of the presidential race.
summary: Vice President Harris, appearing on The Late Show, tackled key issues such as the Gaza conflict and Trump’s pandemic response, while balancing relatability by sharing a beer with Colbert. Harris' media presence emphasises her proactive stance ahead of the presidential race.

title: Controversy grows over nitrogen gas execution method as Alabama plans third case
content: A federal judge is hearing testimony about Alabama's nitrogen gas executions as the state plans another using this method for inmate Carey Dale Grayson. Grayson's attorneys argue for a preliminary injunction due to ignored protocol issues. Concerns arose from previous executions showing possible distress, prompting ethical questions on the method's humaneness.
summary: A federal judge is hearing testimony about Alabama's nitrogen gas executions as the state plans another using this method for inmate Carey Dale Grayson. Grayson's attorneys argue for a preliminary injunction due to ignored protocol issues. Concerns arose from previous executions showing possible distress, prompting ethical questions on the method's humaneness.

title: Hurricane Milton: How to stay safe during the emergency
content: Hurricane Milton, a Category 5 storm, is set to hit Tampa Bay with winds of 180 mph. Residents should prepare hurricane kits, charge devices, and seek shelter in interior rooms. Evacuation orders are in place for Southwest Florida due to storm surges and heavy rainfall. Curfews and airport closures are also implemented.
summary: Hurricane Milton, a Category 5 storm, is set to hit Tampa Bay with winds of 180 mph. Residents should prepare hurricane kits, charge devices, and seek shelter in interior rooms. Evacuation orders are in place for Southwest Florida due to storm surges and heavy rainfall. Curfews and airport closures are also implemented.

title: Ethel Kennedy, widow of Senator Robert F Kennedy Sr suffers stroke in sleep, hospitalised
content: Ethel Kennedy, aged 96, was hospitalized after suffering a stroke last week. Her daughter Rory Kennedy shared that she is comfortable and surrounded by family. Despite her age, Ethel enjoyed an active summer with loved ones, participating in various family activities.
summary: Ethel Kennedy, aged 96, was hospitalized after suffering a stroke last week. Her daughter Rory Kennedy shared that she is comfortable and surrounded by family. Despite her age, Ethel enjoyed an active summer with loved ones, participating in various family activities.

title: Hurricane Milton: Millions flee amid fuel shortages and traffic chaos in Florida
content: Hurricane Milton, a Category 5 storm, is nearing Florida's Gulf Coast, prompting mass evacuations and causing fuel shortages and traffic chaos. With storm surges posing severe threats and the state already impacted by Hurricane Helene, officials and President Biden have issued dire warnings for immediate evacuation.
summary: Hurricane Milton, a Category 5 storm, is nearing Florida's Gulf Coast, prompting mass evacuations and causing fuel shortages and traffic chaos. With storm surges posing severe threats and the state already impacted by Hurricane Helene, officials and President Biden have issued dire warnings for immediate evacuation.

title: Remains of American woman's body found inside Shark's stomach
content: The remains of Colleen Monfore, a retired American woman, were found inside a shark near Indonesia after she disappeared while diving. A friend suggests Monfore possibly died from a medical issue rather than a shark attack, given the timeline of events. An investigation into her death, involving US and local authorities, is ongoing.
summary: The remains of Colleen Monfore, a retired American woman, were found inside a shark near Indonesia after she disappeared while diving. A friend suggests Monfore possibly died from a medical issue rather than a shark attack, given the timeline of events. An investigation into her death, involving US and local authorities, is ongoing.

title: Small town in Thailand hold mass cremation for 23 who died in a school trip bus fire
content: Mourners in central Thailand attended the cremation of 23 students and teachers who died in a bus fire during a school trip. The tragedy, which led to legal actions and an investigation of safety procedures, was sponsored by King Maha Vajiralongkorn.
summary: Mourners in central Thailand attended the cremation of 23 students and teachers who died in a bus fire during a school trip. The tragedy, which led to legal actions and an investigation of safety procedures, was sponsored by King Maha Vajiralongkorn.

title: Afghan immigrant arrested in Oklahoma for planning election day 'terrorist attack'
content: Nasir Ahmad Tawhedi, 27, and an underage accomplice were arrested in Oklahoma for allegedly planning an election day terrorist attack. Tawhedi, who entered the US on a special immigrant visa, sought to purchase AK-47 rifles and researched Washington, DC surveillance. The attack was intended in ISIS's name, targeting public gatherings and aspiring to die as martyrs.
summary: Nasir Ahmad Tawhedi, 27, and an underage accomplice were arrested in Oklahoma for allegedly planning an election day terrorist attack. Tawhedi, who entered the US on a special immigrant visa, sought to purchase AK-47 rifles and researched Washington, DC surveillance. The attack was intended in ISIS's name, targeting public gatherings and aspiring to die as martyrs.

title: ‘Cooperative’ DeSantis wins Biden’s approval as Harris slams Hurricane response
content: President Biden commended Florida governor Ron DeSantis for his effective response to Hurricanes Helene and Milton, contrasting with Vice President Harris' criticism of political gamesmanship. Biden emphasized the cooperative effort, while DeSantis denied awareness of Harris' outreach and defended his non-political stance.
summary: President Biden commended Florida governor Ron DeSantis for his effective response to Hurricanes Helene and Milton, contrasting with Vice President Harris' criticism of political gamesmanship. Biden emphasized the cooperative effort, while DeSantis denied awareness of Harris' outreach and defended his non-political stance.

title: Brazil's supreme court reinstates X after Elon Musk's agreement to court orders
content: Brazil's supreme court has allowed social media platform X to resume operations after it complied with court rulings it previously defied. Justice Alexandre de Moraes cited X's adherence to hate speech moderation and appointment of a local representative, leading to the immediate reinstatement of services in Brazil.
summary: Brazil's supreme court has allowed social media platform X to resume operations after it complied with court rulings it previously defied. Justice Alexandre de Moraes cited X's adherence to hate speech moderation and appointment of a local representative, leading to the immediate reinstatement of services in Brazil.

title: Why is Osama Bin Laden's son permanently banned from France?
content: Omar Bin Laden, son of Osama Bin Laden, has been permanently banned from France after being accused of glorifying terrorism on social media. France’s new Interior Minister, Bruno Retailleau, announced the decision, citing Omar's controversial posts commemorating his father's death. Retailleau’s strict stance on immigration and political Islam has sparked criticism from opponents.
summary: Omar Bin Laden, son of Osama Bin Laden, has been permanently banned from France after being accused of glorifying terrorism on social media. France’s new Interior Minister, Bruno Retailleau, announced the decision, citing Omar's controversial posts commemorating his father's death. Retailleau’s strict stance on immigration and political Islam has sparked criticism from opponents.

title: French PM Michel Barnier survives no-confidence vote: Far-right secures fragile government
content: Michel Barnier, France's new prime minister, survived a no-confidence motion proposed by the left-wing opposition, highlighting his fragile government’s vulnerability in the National Assembly. The far-right National Rally’s opposition to the motion played a crucial role in its failure, ensuring Barnier's continued governance.
summary: Michel Barnier, France's new prime minister, survived a no-confidence motion proposed by the left-wing opposition, highlighting his fragile government’s vulnerability in the National Assembly. The far-right National Rally’s opposition to the motion played a crucial role in its failure, ensuring Barnier's continued governance.

title: Who is Renad Attallah? The 10-year-old inspiring hope with cooking tutorials from war-ridden Gaza
content: Ten-year-old Renad Attallah shares cooking tutorials on Instagram from the Gaza Strip, showcasing creative recipes with limited ingredients amid war. Her videos, including dishes made from aid packages, offer comfort and hope. Renad's growing global following supports her efforts to feed families in Gaza, blending culinary creativity with activism.
summary: Ten-year-old Renad Attallah shares cooking tutorials on Instagram from the Gaza Strip, showcasing creative recipes with limited ingredients amid war. Her videos, including dishes made from aid packages, offer comfort and hope. Renad's growing global following supports her efforts to feed families in Gaza, blending culinary creativity with activism.

title: Meghan Markle sends a coded message to the Royal family: 'I am not hiding'
content: Meghan Markle made a bold solo appearance at a Los Angeles red carpet event, donning a previously worn red dress, signaling her independence from the Royal family and readiness for Hollywood. Despite rumors of marital issues with Prince Harry, close friends claim they are not divorcing but pursuing separate professional paths.
summary: Meghan Markle made a bold solo appearance at a Los Angeles red carpet event, donning a previously worn red dress, signaling her independence from the Royal family and readiness for Hollywood. Despite rumors of marital issues with Prince Harry, close friends claim they are not divorcing but pursuing separate professional paths.

title: P Diddy in prison but celebrities are still afraid to cross him: Report
content: ​P Diddy has not pleaded guilty and is still in jail as he was not granted bail. More and more complaints are coming out in the open every day of how he exploited minors, how he promised to make careers and then exploited the industry people. An expert said the scandal is now so big that there can be no PR damage control.
summary: ​P Diddy has not pleaded guilty and is still in jail as he was not granted bail. More and more complaints are coming out in the open every day of how he exploited minors, how he promised to make careers and then exploited the industry people. An expert said the scandal is now so big that there can be no PR damage control.
